TopicTitle: [Showcase] Kerbal Boat Program: Share your nautical ventures

Articles.Content:
So recently I've found myself making various kinds of naval vessels ranging from aircraft carriers to landing craft and I'm hoping I and others will be able to share their contraptions here.

______________________________________

I'll start

This bad boy is a fully functional aircraft carrier

Complete with a ski ramp, aircraft tug and well deck

This SSTO can also take off, get to orbit, return and land back on a landing deck that's only 70 metres long
